mapper.select: select count(rob.robot_id) as value from mly_robot rob
select rob.robot_id, rob.account, rob.nickname, rob.species_id, rob.birthday, rob.gender, rob.comefrom, rob.hobby, rob.comment from mly_robot rob where rob.robot_id = #{robotId}
mapper.update: update mly_robot rob set rob.robot_id=#{robotId}, rob.account=#{account}, rob.nickname=#{nickname}, rob.species_id=#{speciesId}, rob.birthday=now(), rob.gender=#{gender}, rob.comefrom=#{comefrom}, rob.hobby=#{hobby}, rob.comment=#{comment} where rob.robot_id=#{robotId}
